title: Javid orders review of medical device racial bias
content: The health secretary responds to research suggesting oximeters work less well for darker-skinned people.

title: Javid orders review of medical device racial bias
content: The health secretary responds to research suggesting oximeters work less well for darker-skinned people.

title: Mental health deaths on the rise, figures suggest
content: An ex-health secretary warns staff shortages are now compromising patient safety in the NHS.

title: State bank risked £335m to back Greensill, say MPs
content: A government-backed bank did not scrutinise Greensill Capital properly, MPs say.

title: Minister to lead review into migrant crossings
content: Stephen Barclay will explore what government departments can do amid record numbers of Channel crossings.

title: MPs back raising minimum marriage age to 18
content: Tory Pauline Latham says outdated laws allow child marriage in the UK, which is tantamount to child abuse.

title: Starmer attacks Tory record on migrant crossings
content: The Labour leader says deals with France are not sufficient, and aid cuts have increased migration.

title: Paul Dacre quits race to head Ofcom media watchdog
content: The former Daily Mail editor says he will not take part in a re-run process to find the next chair.
